entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: • Status changed from submitted to initial review

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to author action
  • Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Thijs Metsch

Hello Thijs,

could you please run the doc through latex again, to fix table of contents and section references? Also, you may want to add a \newpage before Section 7 'Contributors', and possibly before Section 3 'OCCI JSON Rendering and 5 'Detailed Examples' (sorry for nitpicking And Ralf's affiliation is missing in the header.

Otherwise this looks good to me for public comment, and we should be able to advance it at the next GFSG call (once you updated the PDF).

Thanks, Andre

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Let's try to resolve this (Thijs please work with Andre to fix the formatting problems and other issues noted), so we can get this moved into public comment at OGF 39.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to public comment
  • Priority changed from High to Normal

We will go ahead with 60-day public comment with this document. The formatting still needs to be fixed. Authors/editors, please solicit input from your constituencies during public comment.
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Has the public comment period been completed? I can't find this in either the public comments area or the public comments archive.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Thijs Metsch to Andre Merzky

document needs some cleanup before going into public comment. I have access to the sources now, and will take care of it this week.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering

Fixed formatting, now ready for public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to public comment

Thanks for this. Andre, please let me know when the public comment tracker is set up, and I'll announce it.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The public comment tracker has been created at https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/19, and can be announced.

Thanks Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
Greg, this is a reminder to announce for public comment -- or did I simple miss the memo?

    Thanks, Andre.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: there was in fact a timely announcement (which I missed).

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action

Authors/editors: Public comment is complete. Please review comments, and respond in that tracker or here. You can make changes in the document submission, as needed. Let me know when you are ready for the next stage, which is standards council review prior to publication.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Update from the July 8 is that the group is actively working on this, and we hope for progress soon.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Please check with the group to see where this document fits in their current document plan.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Per the standards council telecon on November 25, this document is still seeing some revision and consideration. gbn

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: Per the standards council telecon on February 3, via the area director, there is still no update from the OCCI group on this document.

entry.title: Editor - document #96: Open Cloud Computing Interface - JSON Rendering
entry.content: we will put a new version through public comment asap. this issue can be closed.
